actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to authorize assistance to certain United States air carriers.

summary.text: Authorizes the Export-Import Bank to provide guarantees, insurance, and extensions of credit to United States Air carriers whose principal competitors are foreign air carriers which have received the benefit of Bank guarantees, insurance, or credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to authorize assistance to certain United States air carriers.
